attributes.action: State Country of Origin for all online product sales
attributes.additional_details:
I believe the consumer has the right of choice.
I want to support British business.
I want to support poorer nations by buying their products.
I want to feel my purchasing choices helped make a difference in the places I care about.
attributes.background: Make it law for all UK hosted online sales to state Country of Origin at the point of sale for all products. So that the online consumer has the same rights of choice as those on the high street.
